V.iii.5.1.h
.
Definition:Â  Congenital Heart Defects
Congenital heart defects
include common heart conditions due to prenatal influences, such as
patent foramen ovale
patent ductus arteriosus
coarctation of the aorta, and
intraventricular septal defect.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5 - Cardiovascular System Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5, Section None
